title: Bug 120315: Display property not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it doesn't hide the item as expected.
OB: Open the generated PDF file and observe the label element. It is still visible.
EB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', the item should be hidden in the new PDF emitter.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Add a label element. 2. Open the 'properties' view. 3. Set the sectionDisplay property of the label to 'none'.
